Title: VM Workshop
Description:
The VM Workshop is a simple reference application demonstrating the Model View ViewModel (MVVM) and Presentation Model pattern in a number of different UI platforms:

 - Silverlight
 - WPF 
 - WebForms 
 - ASP.NET MVC 
 - Ajax 
 - WinForms 

Available in C# and VB.NET
